com.zpaper.gateway

Class OutboundMessageProxyServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.mitre.dsmiley.httpproxy.ProxyServlet
          • com.zpaper.gateway.ZPaperProxyServlet
            • com.zpaper.gateway.OutboundMessageProxyServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class OutboundMessageProxyServlet
extends ZPaperProxyServlet
    An extension of the com.zpaper.ZPaperProxyServlet, this module provides the HttpHost from the request parameters
    NOTES:
    
 [cmashton@cma-lt1 test]$ cat testoutboundmessage
 #!/bin/bash

 # curl -X POST -d @myfilename http://user:pass@myhost/hudson/job/_jobName_/postBuildResult
 for n in {01..400} ; do echo $n; ( time curl -X POST --connect-timeout 10 -d @testoutboundmessage.xml 'https://gwt.zpaper.com/services/OutboundMessageService' & );  done

 [cmashton@cma-lt1 test]$ cat testoutboundmessage.xml
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <soapenv:Body>
   <notifications xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2005/09/outbound">
    <OrganizationId>00D500000006bU5EAI</OrganizationId>
    <ActionId>04k50000000L4OBAA0</ActionId>
    <SessionId>00D500000006bU5!AQMAQF2odg2ErdycZ8hyav2gUee70ATjWdHehrzoA3Afc6p9WUpEEleX6HR2vm9AZvveWzxPkpHmnYd2SAIEgIGY4Mks.YZz</SessionId>
    <EnterpriseUrl>https://na3.salesforce.com/services/Soap/c/41.0/00D500000006bU5</EnterpriseUrl>
    <PartnerUrl>https://na3.salesforce.com/services/Soap/u/41.0/00D500000006bU5</PartnerUrl>
    <Notification>
     <Id>04l5000002ccQEXAA2</Id>
     <sObject xsi:type="sf:Account" xmlns:sf="urn:sobject.enterprise.soap.sforce.com">
      <sf:Id>0015000000NEXPuAAP</sf:Id>
      <sf:Fax>(678) 815-1518</sf:Fax>
      <sf:Name>Mark Ashton Account</sf:Name>
     </sObject>
    </Notification>
   </notifications>
  </soapenv:Body>
 </soapenv:Envelope>
